attributes.action: Force HMRC to be more thankful for the taxes it receives from small businesses.
attributes.background: In the service industry, VAT is generated as a result of an individual or business undertaking work. It is then collected by, accounted for and paid for, by such a person directly to the HMRC. No thank you offered for your efforts on their behalf, and yet late payment results in penalty charges!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a new petition calling clearly for a specific action.
